description:
News of Ken-Oh`s defeat causes upheaval in his troops, and before long his plans begin to crumble from the ground up.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Akumu ni Obieru Raou! Yuria, Mou Omae Shika Inai!!
Raoh, Shaken by a Nightmare! Yuria, You Are the Only One!!
Raoul est en plein cauchemar ! Julia, il n`y a plus que toi !!
Vivrai per sempre nel mio cuore
悪夢におびえるラオウ! ユリア, もうお前しかいない!!
